00037         class PerlinModuleBase : public Module
00038         {
00039                 protected:
00041                         Real mFrequency;
00043                         int mOctaveCount;
00045                         int mSeed;
00047                         int mQuality;
00049                         Real mLacunarity;
00051                         Real mPersistence;
00053                         Real mScale;
00054 
00055                 public:
00057                         PerlinModuleBase () :
00058                         mFrequency(1.0), mOctaveCount(6), mSeed(0), mQuality(NOISE_QUALITY_STD), mLacunarity(2.0), mPersistence(0.5), mScale(2.12) {}
00059                         virtual ~PerlinModuleBase () {}
00060 
00062                         void setFrequency (Real v)
00063                         {
00064                                 mFrequency = v;
00065                         }
00067                         Real getFrequency () const
00068                         {
00069                                 return mFrequency;
00070                         }
00072                         void setOctaveCount (int v)
00073                         {
00074                                 mOctaveCount = v;
00075                         }
00077                         int getOctaveCount () const
00078                         {
00079                                 return mOctaveCount;
00080                         }
00082                         void setSeed (int v)
00083                         {
00084                                 mSeed = v;
00085                         }
00087                         int getSeed () const
00088                         {
00089                                 return mSeed;
00090                         }
00092                         void setQuality (int v)
00093                         {
00094                                 mQuality = v;
00095                         }
00097                         int getQuality () const
00098                         {
00099                                 return mQuality;
00100                         }
00102                         void setLacunarity (Real v)
00103                         {
00104                                 mLacunarity = v;
00105                         }
00107                         Real getLacunarity () const
00108                         {
00109                                 return mLacunarity;
00110                         }
00112                         void setPersistence (Real v)
00113                         {
00114                                 mPersistence = v;
00115                         }
00117                         Real getPersistence () const
00118                         {
00119                                 return mPersistence;
00120                         }
00122                         void setScale (Real v)
00123                         {
00124                                 mScale = v;
00125                         }
00127                         Real getScale ()
00128                         {
00129                                 return mScale;
00130                         }
00131 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00133                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00135                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00136 #endif
00137         };
00138 
00139         class PerlinElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00140         {
00141                 private:
00142                         struct Octave
00143                         {
00144                                 int seed;
00145                                 Real scale;
00146                                 Real persistence;
00147                         };
00148                         Octave *mOctaves;
00149                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00150                         int mQuality;
00151                         Real mScale;
00152 
00153                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, int seed) const
00154                         {
00155                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00156                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, seed, mScale);
00157                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00158                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, seed, mScale);
00159                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00160                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, seed, mScale);
00161                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00162                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, seed, mScale);
00163                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00164                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, seed, mScale);
00165                                 else
00166                                         return Generator1D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, seed, mScale);
00167                         }
00168                 public:
00169                         PerlinElement1D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00170                         {
00171                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00172                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00173                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00174                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00175                                 int seed;
00176                                 Real scale = frequency;
00177                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00178                                 {
00179                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00180                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00181                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00182                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00183 
00184                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00185                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00186                                 }
00187                         }
00188                         virtual ~PerlinElement1D ()
00189                         {
00190                                 delete mOctaves;
00191                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00192                         }
00193                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00194                         {
00195                                 Real value = 0.0;
00196                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00197 
00198                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00199                                 {
00200                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00201                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, mOctaves[o].seed);
00202 
00203                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00204                                 }
00205 
00206                                 return value;
00207                         }
00208         };
00209 
00210         class PerlinElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00211         {
00212                 private:
00213                         struct Octave
00214                         {
00215                                 int seed;
00216                                 Real scale;
00217                                 Real persistence;
00218                         };
00219                         Octave *mOctaves;
00220                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00221                         int mQuality;
00222                         Real mScale;
00223 
00224                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, Real y, int seed) const
00225                         {
00226                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00227                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, y, seed, mScale);
00228                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00229                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, y, seed, mScale);
00230                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00231                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, y, seed, mScale);
00232                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00233                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, y, seed, mScale);
00234                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00235                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, y, seed, mScale);
00236                                 else
00237                                         return Generator2D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, y, seed, mScale);
00238                         }
00239                 public:
00240                         PerlinElement2D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00241                         {
00242                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00243                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00244                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00245                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00246                                 int seed;
00247                                 Real scale = frequency;
00248                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00249                                 {
00250                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00251                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00252                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00253                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00254 
00255                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00256                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00257                                 }
00258                         }
00259                         virtual ~PerlinElement2D ()
00260                         {
00261                                 delete mOctaves;
00262                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00263                         }
00264                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00265                         {
00266                                 Real value = 0.0;
00267                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00268 
00269                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00270                                 {
00271                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00272                                         const Real ny = Math::MakeInt32Range (y * mOctaves[o].scale);
00273                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, ny, mOctaves[o].seed);
00274 
00275                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00276                                 }
00277 
00278                                 return value;
00279                         }
00280         };
00281 
00282         class PerlinElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00283         {
00284                 private:
00285                         struct Octave
00286                         {
00287                                 int seed;
00288                                 Real scale;
00289                                 Real persistence;
00290                         };
00291                         Octave *mOctaves;
00292                         size_t mOctaveCount;
00293                         int mQuality;
00294                         Real mScale;
00295 
00296                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real calculateGradient (Real x, Real y, Real z, int seed) const
00297                         {
00298                                 if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_STD)
00299                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseStd (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00300                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00301                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseHigh (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00302                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_LOW)
00303                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentNoiseLow (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00304                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_STD)
00305                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseStd (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00306                                 else if (mQuality == NOISE_QUALITY_FAST_HIGH)
00307                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseHigh (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00308                                 else
00309                                         return Generator3D::calcGradientCoherentFastNoiseLow (x, y, z, seed, mScale);
00310                         }
00311                 public:
00312                         PerlinElement3D (size_t octaves, Real frequency, Real lacunarity, Real persistence, int mainSeed, int quality, Real nscale) : mOctaveCount(octaves), mQuality(quality), mScale(nscale)
00313                         {
00314                                 if (quality > NOISE_QUALITY_HIGH)
00315                                         mScale *= FAST_NOISE_SCALE_FACTOR;
00316                                 mOctaves = new Octave[mOctaveCount];
00317                                 Real curPersistence = 1.0;
00318                                 int seed;
00319                                 Real scale = frequency;
00320                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00321                                 {
00322                                         seed = (mainSeed + int(o)) & 0xffffffff;
00323                                         mOctaves[o].persistence = curPersistence;
00324                                         mOctaves[o].scale = scale;
00325                                         mOctaves[o].seed = seed;
00326 
00327                                         scale *= lacunarity;
00328                                         curPersistence *= persistence;
00329                                 }
00330                         }
00331                         virtual ~PerlinElement3D ()
00332                         {
00333                                 delete mOctaves;
00334                                 mOctaves = NULL;
00335                         }
00336                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00337                         {
00338                                 Real value = 0.0;
00339                                 Real signal = 1.0;
00340 
00341                                 for (size_t o=0;o<mOctaveCount;++o)
00342                                 {
00343                                         const Real nx = Math::MakeInt32Range (x * mOctaves[o].scale);
00344                                         const Real ny = Math::MakeInt32Range (y * mOctaves[o].scale);
00345                                         const Real nz = Math::MakeInt32Range (z * mOctaves[o].scale);
00346                                         signal = calculateGradient(nx, ny, nz, mOctaves[o].seed);
00347 
00348                                         value += signal * mOctaves[o].persistence;
00349                                 }
00350 
00351                                 return value;
00352                         }
00353         };
00354 
00358         class PerlinModule : public PerlinModuleBase
00359         {
00360                 public:
00362                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00363                         {
00364                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new PerlinElement1D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00365                         }
00367                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00368                         {
00369                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new PerlinElement2D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00370                         }
00372                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00373                         {
00374                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new PerlinElement3D(mOctaveCount, mFrequency, mLacunarity, mPersistence, mSeed+pipe->getSeed(), mQuality, mScale));
00375                         }
00377                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_PERLIN; }
00378         };
00379 };
